name: FoodStorm Sidebar Widget for WordPress
author: CaterXpress

sections.description:
The FoodStorm Sidebar Widget for WordPress allows you to add your FoodStorm shopping cart to the navigation in your WordPress site.

FoodStorm is catering software that tracks your food orders, with other neat features like food costing, stock control and more.

Like the sound of this plugin but don’t have a FoodStorm account yet? Sign up for a 30 day free catering software trial, no credit card needed.
sections.installation:
For an automatic installation through WordPress:

  1. Go to the ‘Add New’ plugins screen in your WordPress admin area
  2. Search for ‘FoodStorm for WordPress’
  3. Click ‘Install Now’ and activate the plugin

For a manual installation via FTP:

  1. Upload the addthis folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in your WordPress admin area

To upload the plugin through WordPress, instead of FTP:

  1. Upload the downloaded zip file on the ‘Add New’ plugins screen (see the ‘Upload’ tab) in your WordPress admin area and activate.
sections.faq:
• I don’t have a FoodStorm account, can I still use this plugin?

    You need a FoodStorm account to use this plugin. You can sign up for a 30 day free catering software trial, no credit card needed.
